FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, easterly or northeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 in east, becoming variable 2 to 4 later in south. In north, variable 2 to 4, becoming southerly or southwesterly 3 to 5, occasionally 6 in west.
Sea state
Moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, fair. In north, fair.
Visibility
In south, good. In north, good.
